text: Yamaguchi is a city in western Japan. It is the capital of Yamaguchi Prefecture. The city had a population of 198,971 people in 2010. Yamaguchi was made when 40 towns were merged on April 1, 1889. == Other websites == * Yamaguchi's Official city website (Japanese) Category:Cities in Yamaguchi Prefecture
title: Yamaguchi (city)
